attributes.action: Annual political conferences to be held simultaneously
attributes.additional_details: This would result in only 4/5 days being set aside for party conference season.
attributes.background: To maximise periods available for Parliament and committees to sit. To ensure the political party's are able to more accurately represent their aspirations and policies for the coming period with reduced capability to gain say and counter those of opposing party's.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for the political parties rather than the UK Government or Parliament.
